actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 102-70, by Mr. Derrick.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H. Con. Res. 121. Resolution waives all points of order against the conference report and against its consideration.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 19.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 257 - 164 (Roll no. 111).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Waiving all points of order against the conference report on the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 121) revising the congressional budget for the United States Government for the fiscal year 1991 and setting forth the congressional budget for the United States Government for the fiscal years 1992, 1993, 1994, 1995, and 1996, and against the consideration of such conference report.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of H. Con. Res. 121 (congressional budget for FY 1991 through 1996).

titles.title: Waiving all points of order against the conference report on the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 121) revising the congressional budget for the United States Government for the fiscal year 1991 and setting forth the congressional budget for the United States Government for the fiscal years 1992, 1993, 1994, 1995, and 1996, and against the consideration of such conference report.
